snippet: Tom Brady threw four touchdown passes as the New England Patriots turned their much-hyped game against the visiting Houston Texans into a 42-14 mismatch on Monday night.
abstract: NFL Roundup; New England Patriots defeat Houston Texans, 42-14; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Tom Brady threw four touchdown passes as the New England Patriots turned their much-hyped game against the visiting Houston Texans into a 42-14 mismatch on Monday night.

headline.seo: Riding Brady, Patriots Blow Out Texans
headline.main: Riding Brady, Patriots Whip a Contender
headline.print_headline: Riding Brady, Patriots Whip A Contender
